channel.title: Photos on Sid Verma
channel.description: Recent content in Photos on Sid Verma

item.title: House tour
item.description: I moved into a much older house in Goa earlier this year, and had a lot of fun these past months setting it up and wiring it down. It’s very janky, dusty, and lovely.

item.title: Backpacking 2019
item.description: Been backpacking for a few months, while severely reducing camera time. Here are some photos from Goa, Kolkata, Bangkok and Pai.

item.title: Ziro Festival 2019
item.description: I was not planning to go to the Ziro Festival this year, but the dates coincided with a layover in Kolkata, and hence made the stop.

item.title: Andaman Islands
item.description: Family took a few days off to spend some time in the Andaman Islands.

item.title: (Hillhikes and) Hillhacks 2019
item.description: It felt disingenuous to just call this album Hillhacks 2019, given the extreme lack of actual conference photos here. The main motive of venturing out was Hillhacks, but the hikes we padded it with were much more photogenic.

item.title: Week in Goa
item.description: The annual trip with a couple of close friends took us to Arambol, Goa this year. We did spend more time in the hills of Goa rather than the beaches this time around.

item.title: Hackbeach 2018
item.description: Hackbeach revisited the previous venue too in 2018. The water was way calmer, and almost every attendee learned to swim at least to a basic level in the ocean.

item.title: Ziro Festival 2018
item.description: Ziro Festival of Music is a music festival which takes place in the Ziro Valley (duh) every year. Probably one of the prettiest places to have a concert in the country.

item.title: Trip to Leh
item.description: Left hillhacks early to visit the Ladakh area with my family.

item.title: Hillhacks 2018
item.description: Hillhacks repeats the venue in 2018, hence slightly easier to organise.

item.title: Road trip to Jaisalmer
item.description: Road trips aren’t usually my thing, nor deserts. But this trip turned out to be fun anyway.

item.title: Hackbeach 2017
item.description: Hackbeach 2017 happened right at the main beach in Gokarna.

item.title: Hillhacks 2017
item.description: Some Hillhacks 2017 photos and even more from a stop at Dharamshala and some hills.
